modName: Importing Armour models into Skyrim Tutorial 1-0
summary: Learn how to import models in 3ds max into Skyrim as armour.
descriptionHtml:
Found a useful video tutorial explaining how to import helmet models http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L40qoiuUXL4&feature=player_embedded

Other Tutorials
--------------------
Weapons http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2158

Description
----------------
First draft of my tutorial on how to import models into Skyrim as armour using 3ds max and Nifskope.

I wrote this tutorial with noobs in mind, I hope its easy to follow.

Any feedback of mistakes or a better work flow are welcome.
author: Maniczombie

files.name: Importing Armour Models into Skyrim Tutorial 1-0
